issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

fields.summary: Bogus Error Message when creating security group that already exists

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: No Error Message on duplicate rule when using euca-authorize

status.description: This issue has been validated/reproduced, but has not been prioritized yet.
status.name: Confirmed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Bogus Error Message when trying to delete security group that has a resource using it (i.e. running instance in security group)

comments.body: Confirmed. *Steps to Reproduce* * Create security group * Launch instance in that security group (-g option) * Once instance gets into running state, attempt to delete the security group; observe error code and message *Error message with full debug* {code} # euca-delete-group zenlb-test --debug 2013-03-16 12:18:05,970 euca2ools [DEBUG]:Using access key provided by client. 2013-03-16 12:18:05,970 euca2ools [DEBUG]:Using secret key provided by client. 2013-03-16 12:18:05,971 euca2ools [DEBUG]:Method: POST 2013-03-16 12:18:05,971 euca2ools [DEBUG]:Path:
